### GRAMMATICAL CASE | ПАДЕЖИ ###
## GENITIVE | РОДИТЕЛЬНЫЙ ##
RU_CL_RP = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:HOL
					this = c:HOL
					c:HOL = {
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:SCH
					this = c:SCH
					c:SCH = {
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_schleswig_holstein # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:ALD
			this = c:ALD
			c:ALD = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				has_variable = algeria_deylik_restored
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_regency_of_algiers # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				OR = {
					has_variable = orleanist_restoration_var
					has_variable = legitimist_restoration_var
				}
				has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_french_kingdom # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:ALD
			this = c:ALD
			c:ALD = { has_variable = algeria_maghreb_restored }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_maghreb # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:SAV
			this = c:SAV
			c:SAV = { capital = { state_region = s:STATE_RHONE  } }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_lyon # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:SAV
			this = c:SAV
			c:SAV = { capital = { state_region = s:STATE_WEST_SWITZERLAND  } }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_romandy # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				has_variable = bonapartist_restoration_var
				has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_french_empire # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				OR = {
					has_law = law_type:law_parliamentary_republic
					has_law = law_type:law_presidential_republic
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_french_republic # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA

		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_french_commune # genitive

	}

		trigger = {

		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_united_communes_pns # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:RUS
			this = c:RUS
			coa_def_nihilist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_union_of_new_people # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:GER
			this = c:GER

		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_nihilist_germany_name # genitive

	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:CAL
			this = c:CAL
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_ussr_californias # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:CAL
			this = c:CAL
			c:CAL = {
				owns_entire_state_region = STATE_CALIFORNIA
				owns_entire_state_region = STATE_BAJA_CALIFORNIA
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_two_californias # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:KAZ
			this = c:KAZ
			c:KAZ = {
				NOT = {
					has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				}
			}
			coa_def_independent_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_kazakh_republic # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:KAZ
			this = c:KAZ
			c:KAZ = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
			}
			coa_def_independent_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_kazakh_khanate # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:KAZ
			this = c:KAZ
			AND = {
				exists = c:RUS
				c:RUS = {
					NOR = {
						has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
						has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
					}
					OR = {
						has_diplomatic_pact = {
							who = c:KAZ
							type = puppet
							is_initiator = yes
						}
						has_diplomatic_pact = {
							who = c:KAZ
							type = dominion
							is_initiator = yes
						}
						has_diplomatic_pact = {
							who = c:KAZ
							type = protectorate
							is_initiator = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_kazakh_alash_autonomy # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:MAD
			this = c:MAD
			c:MAD = {
				coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
				is_country_type = unrecognized
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_merina_kingdom # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:WLS
			this = c:WLS
			c:WLS = {
				capital = { state_region = s:STATE_PATAGONIA }
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_welsh_patagonia # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
					count > 0
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count < 1
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_united_senators # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_def_republic_flag_trigger = yes
			NOT = { coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes }
			NOT = {	
				c:USA = {
					has_law = law_type:law_technocracy
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_united_states # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA

## DATIVE | ДАТЕЛЬНЫЙ ##
RU_CL_DP = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:HOL
					this = c:HOL
					c:HOL = {
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:SCH
					this = c:SCH
					c:SCH = {
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_schleswig_holstein # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:ALD
			this = c:ALD
			c:ALD = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				has_variable = algeria_deylik_restored
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_regency_of_algiers # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				OR = {
					has_variable = orleanist_restoration_var
					has_variable = legitimist_restoration_var
				}
				has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_french_kingdom # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:ALD
			this = c:ALD
			c:ALD = { has_variable = algeria_maghreb_restored }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_maghreb # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:SAV
			this = c:SAV
			c:SAV = { capital = { state_region = s:STATE_RHONE  } }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_lyon # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:SAV
			this = c:SAV
			c:SAV = { capital = { state_region = s:STATE_WEST_SWITZERLAND  } }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_romandy # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				has_variable = bonapartist_restoration_var
				has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_french_empire # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				OR = {
					has_law = law_type:law_parliamentary_republic
					has_law = law_type:law_presidential_republic
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_french_republic # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_french_commune # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:PNS
			this = c:PNS
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_united_communes_pns # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:RUS
			this = c:RUS
			coa_def_nihilist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_union_of_new_people # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:GER
			this = c:GER
			coa_def_nihilist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_nihilist_germany_name # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:CAL
			this = c:CAL
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_ussr_californias # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:CAL
			this = c:CAL
			c:CAL = {
				owns_entire_state_region = STATE_CALIFORNIA
				owns_entire_state_region = STATE_BAJA_CALIFORNIA
			}

## ACCUSATIVE | ВИНИТЕЛЬНЫЙ ##
RU_CL_VP = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:HOL
					this = c:HOL
					c:HOL = {
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:SCH
					this = c:SCH
					c:SCH = {
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_schleswig_holstein # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:ALD
			this = c:ALD
			c:ALD = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				has_variable = algeria_deylik_restored
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_regency_of_algiers # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				OR = {
					has_variable = orleanist_restoration_var
					has_variable = legitimist_restoration_var
				}
				has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_french_kingdom # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:ALD
			this = c:ALD
			c:ALD = { has_variable = algeria_maghreb_restored }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_maghreb # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:SAV
			this = c:SAV
			c:SAV = { capital = { state_region = s:STATE_RHONE  } }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_lyon # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:SAV
			this = c:SAV
			c:SAV = { capital = { state_region = s:STATE_WEST_SWITZERLAND  } }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_romandy # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				has_variable = bonapartist_restoration_var
				has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_french_empire # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				OR = {
					has_law = law_type:law_parliamentary_republic
					has_law = law_type:law_presidential_republic
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_french_republic # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_french_commune # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:PNS
			this = c:PNS
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_united_communes_pns # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:RUS
			this = c:RUS
			coa_def_nihilist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_union_of_new_people # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:GER
			this = c:GER
			coa_def_nihilist_flag_trigger = yes
		}

			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}

	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:CAL
			this = c:CAL
			c:CAL = {

				owns_entire_state_region = STATE_BAJA_CALIFORNIA
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_two_californias # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:KAZ
			this = c:KAZ
			c:KAZ = {
				NOT = {
					has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				}
			}
			coa_def_independent_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_kazakh_republic # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:KAZ
			this = c:KAZ
			c:KAZ = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
			}
			coa_def_independent_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_kazakh_khanate # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:KAZ
			this = c:KAZ
			AND = {
				exists = c:RUS
				c:RUS = {
					NOR = {
						has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
						has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
					}
					OR = {
						has_diplomatic_pact = {
							who = c:KAZ
							type = puppet
							is_initiator = yes
						}
						has_diplomatic_pact = {
							who = c:KAZ
							type = dominion
							is_initiator = yes
						}
						has_diplomatic_pact = {
							who = c:KAZ
							type = protectorate
							is_initiator = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_kazakh_alash_autonomy # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:MAD
			this = c:MAD
			c:MAD = {
				coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
				is_country_type = unrecognized
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_merina_kingdom # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:WLS
			this = c:WLS
			c:WLS = {
				capital = { state_region = s:STATE_PATAGONIA }
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_welsh_patagonia # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
					count > 0
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count < 1
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_united_senators # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_def_republic_flag_trigger = yes
			NOT = { coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes }
			NOT = {	
				c:USA = {
					has_law = law_type:law_technocracy
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_united_states # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_communist_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_united_syndicates_of_america # accusative

	text = {

			exists = c:USA

			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_north_american_technate # accusative

## INSTRUMENTAL | ТВОРИТЕЛЬНЫЙ ##
RU_CL_TP = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:HOL
					this = c:HOL
					c:HOL = {
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:SCH
					this = c:SCH
					c:SCH = {
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_schleswig_holstein # instrumental
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:ALD
			this = c:ALD
			c:ALD = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				has_variable = algeria_deylik_restored
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_regency_of_algiers # instrumental
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				OR = {
					has_variable = orleanist_restoration_var
					has_variable = legitimist_restoration_var
				}
				has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_french_kingdom # instrumental
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:ALD
			this = c:ALD
			c:ALD = { has_variable = algeria_maghreb_restored }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_maghreb # instrumental
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:SAV
			this = c:SAV
			c:SAV = { capital = { state_region = s:STATE_RHONE  } }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_lyon # instrumental
	}

			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			any_scope_state = {
				state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
				count = 1
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_united_state # instrumental
	}

		trigger = {
			exists = c:SUD

## PREPOSITIONAL | ПРЕДЛОЖНЫЙ ##
RU_CL_PP = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:HOL
					this = c:HOL
					c:HOL = {
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:SCH
					this = c:SCH
					c:SCH = {
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_schleswig_holstein # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:ALD
			this = c:ALD
			c:ALD = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				has_variable = algeria_deylik_restored
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_regency_of_algiers # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA

				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy

					has_variable = orleanist_restoration_var
					has_variable = legitimist_restoration_var
				}
				has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_french_kingdom # prepositional
	}

			this = c:BRG
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_BRG # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_DEFAULT # prepositional
	}
}
### CULTURE | КУЛЬТУРЫ ###

### RELIGION | РЕЛИГИИ ###
## ADJECTIVE | ПРИЛАГАТЕЛЬНЫЕ ##
# Православные/Суннитские/Галугпские #
RU_RL_ADJ_IE = {
	type = religion
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:animist
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_animist
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:catholic
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_catholic
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:catholic
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_oriental_orthodox
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:gelugpa
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_gelugpa
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:hindu
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_hindu
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:jewish
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_jewish
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:mahayana
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_mahayana
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:catholic
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_orthodox
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:catholic
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_protestant
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:shiite
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_shiite
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:shinto
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_shinto
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:sikh
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_sikh
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:sunni
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_sunni
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:theravada
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_theravada
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_DEFAULT
	}
}
# Православных/Суннитских/Галугпских #
RU_RL_ADJ_IH = {
	type = religion
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:animist
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_animist
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:catholic
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_catholic
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:catholic
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_oriental_orthodox
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:gelugpa
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_gelugpa
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:hindu
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_hindu
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:jewish
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_jewish
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:mahayana
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_mahayana
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:catholic
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_orthodox
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:catholic
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_protestant
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:shiite
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_shiite
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:shinto
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_shinto
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:sikh
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_sikh
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:sunni
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_sunni
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:theravada
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_theravada
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IH_DEFAULT
	}
}

		}

	}

		}

	}

		}

		}

		}

	}

	}

		trigger = {
			this = rel:shiite
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_shiite

	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:shinto
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_shinto
	}

			this = rel:sikh
		}

	}

		trigger = {
			this = rel:shiite
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_VP_shiite

### COUNTRIES | СТРАНЫ ###
RU_CL_END = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = { # -а
		trigger = {	
			OR = {
				AND = {
				exists = c:ABS
				this = c:ABS
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:ABS										
					target = c:ABS										
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_YA # а
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {	
					exists = c:ALD
					this = c:ALD
					c:ALD = {
						has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
						has_variable = algeria_deylik_restored
					}
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:ALD										
					target = {
						c:ALD = {
							has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
							has_variable = algeria_deylik_restored
						}
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_OE # о
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {	
					exists = c:FRA
					this = c:FRA
					c:FRA = {
						has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
						OR = {
							has_variable = orleanist_restoration_var
							has_variable = legitimist_restoration_var
						}
						has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
					}
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:FRA										
					target = {
						this = c:FRA
						c:FRA = {
							has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
							OR = {
								has_variable = orleanist_restoration_var
								has_variable = legitimist_restoration_var
							}
							has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
						}
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_OE # о
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {

					AND = {
					exists = c:BYE
					this = c:BYE
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:BYE										
						target = c:BYE										
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_YA # а

	text = { # а
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:JAP
					this = c:JAP								
					NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_monarchy }
					has_variable = meiji_var
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					target = {	
						AND = {
							exists = c:JAP								
							this = c:JAP								
							NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_monarchy }
							has_variable = meiji_var								
						}
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_YA # а
	}

								NOT = { c:SIC = { owns_entire_state_region = STATE_CAMPANIA } }
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_YA # а
	}

							AND = {
								exists = c:WLS								
								this = c:WLS								
								capital = { state_region = s:STATE_PATAGONIA }
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_YA # а
	}

	text = { # -й
		trigger = {	
				OR = {
					AND = {
					exists = c:ISQ
					this = c:ISQ
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {

				OR = {
					AND = {
					exists = c:VNT
					this = c:VNT
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:VNT										
						target = c:VNT										
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_OE # о
	}

					}

						initiator = root

									}

							}
						}
					}
					OR = {

						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}

				OR = {
					AND = {
					exists = c:ARG
					this = c:ARG
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:ARG										
						target = c:ARG										
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_FEM_A # а
	}
	text = { # а
		trigger = {	
				OR = {
					AND = {

					this = c:KHI

	text = { # а
		trigger = {	
				OR = {
					AND = {
					exists = c:KOR
					this = c:KOR
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:KOR										
						target = c:KOR										
						c:KOR = { NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_monarchy } }
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution

					this = c:POM
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root

								NOT = { capital = { state_region = s:STATE_LANCASHIRE } }
							}
						}

							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}

					this = c:COM
					}

											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:HBC							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:ORG										
						target = c:ORG										
						c:ORG = {	
							NOR = {
								AND = {
									exists = c:GBR							
									c:GBR = {
										has_diplomatic_pact = {	
											who = scope:actor					
											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:HBC							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_FEM_Y # й
	}

						NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
						exists = capital										
						capital = { state_region = s:STATE_LANCASHIRE }
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						target = {	
							AND = {
								exists = c:GBR								
								this = c:GBR								
								NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
								exists = capital								
								capital = { state_region = s:STATE_LANCASHIRE }
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_FEM_Y # й
	}

RU_CL_END_T = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = { # -а
		trigger = {	
				OR = {
					AND = {
					exists = c:ABS
					this = c:ABS
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:ABS										
						target = c:ABS										
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # ет
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {	
					exists = c:ALD
					this = c:ALD
					c:ALD = {
						has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
						has_variable = algeria_deylik_restored
					}
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:ALD										
					target = {
						c:ALD = {
							has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
							has_variable = algeria_deylik_restored
						}
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution

					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # о
	}

			OR = {
				AND = {

							has_variable = orleanist_restoration_var
							has_variable = legitimist_restoration_var
						}

					}
				}

					c:FRA = {
						OR = {
							has_law = law_type:law_parliamentary_republic
							has_law = law_type:law_presidential_republic
						}
					}
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:FRA										
					target = {
						this = c:FRA
						c:FRA = {
							OR = {
								has_law = law_type:law_parliamentary_republic
								has_law = law_type:law_presidential_republic
							}
						}
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # а

	text = { # а
		trigger = {	
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:COM										
						this = c:COM										
						NOT = { is_country_type = decentralized } # if Comanche is recognized, then they get a more formal name
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						target = {	
							AND = {
								exists = c:COM								
								this = c:COM								
								NOT = { is_country_type = decentralized } # if Comanche is recognized, then they get a more formal name					
							}
						}

								this = c:GBR								
								coa_communist_trigger = yes						
								exists = capital								
								capital = { state_region = s:STATE_LANCASHIRE } 								
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # ет
	}

								AND = {
									exists = c:GBR							
									c:GBR = {
										has_diplomatic_pact = {	
											who = scope:actor					
											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:HBC							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:ORG										
						target = c:ORG

							NOR = {
								AND = {
									exists = c:GBR							
									c:GBR = {
										has_diplomatic_pact = {	
											who = scope:actor					
											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:HBC							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}

								coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes						
							}
							AND = {
								exists = c:ENG								
								c:ENG = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
								coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes						
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						target = {	
							AND = {
								exists = c:TSW								
								this = c:TSW								
								OR = {	
									AND = {
										exists = c:GBR						
										c:GBR = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
										coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes				
									}
									AND = {
										exists = c:ENG						
										c:ENG = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
										coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes				
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # ет
	}

								exists = c:ENG

								coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes						
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						target = {	
							AND = {
								exists = c:ORA								
								this = c:ORA								
								OR = {	
									AND = {
										exists = c:GBR						
										c:GBR = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
										coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes				
									}
									AND = {
										exists = c:ENG						
										c:ENG = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
										coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes				
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # ет
	}

RU_CL_END_GUT = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = { # -а
		trigger = {	
				OR = {
					AND = {
					exists = c:ABS
					this = c:ABS
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:ABS										
						target = c:ABS										
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_GE # же
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {	
					exists = c:ALD
					this = c:ALD
					c:ALD = {
						has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
						has_variable = algeria_deylik_restored
					}
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:ALD										
					target = {
						c:ALD = {
							has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
							has_variable = algeria_deylik_restored
						}
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_GE # о
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {	
					exists = c:FRA
					this = c:FRA
					c:FRA = {
						has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
						OR = {
							has_variable = orleanist_restoration_var
							has_variable = legitimist_restoration_var
						}
						has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
					}
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:FRA										
					target = {
						this = c:FRA
						c:FRA = {
							has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
							OR = {
								has_variable = orleanist_restoration_var
								has_variable = legitimist_restoration_var
							}
							has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
						}
					}
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_GE # о

							}
						}
						OR = {

							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}

								state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
								count > 0								
							}
							any_scope_state = {
								state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
								count < 1								
							}
						}

										count > 0

											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}

							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession

							OR = {
								AND = {
									exists = c:GBR							
									c:GBR = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
									coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes					
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:ENG							
									c:ENG = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
									coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes					
								}
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						target = {	
							AND = {
								exists = c:MKT								
								this = c:MKT								
								coa_monarchy_trigger = yes						
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										AND = {	
											exists = c:GBR					
											c:GBR = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
											coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes			
										}
										AND = {	
											exists = c:ENG					
											c:ENG = { save_temporary_scope_as = custom_overlord }
											coa_def_ensign_trigger = yes			
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_GE # же
	}

								exists = c:CHI								
								this = c:CHI								
								c:CHI = { country_has_primary_culture = cu:manchu }
								coa_monarchy_trigger = yes						
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # ет

					}

						exists = c:USA										
						this = c:USA										
						c:USA = {	
							any_scope_state = {
								state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
								count > 0								
							}
							any_scope_state = {
								state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
								count < 1								
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						target = {	
							AND = {
								exists = c:USA								
								this = c:USA								
								c:USA = {

										state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
										count > 0

										count < 1

								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}

						exists = c:ORG
						this = c:ORG
						c:ORG = {	
							NOR = {
								AND = {
									exists = c:GBR							
									c:GBR = {
										has_diplomatic_pact = {	
											who = scope:actor					
											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:HBC							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root										
						exists = c:ORG										
						target = c:ORG										
						c:ORG = {	
							NOR = {
								AND = {
									exists = c:GBR							
									c:GBR = {
										has_diplomatic_pact = {	
											who = scope:actor					
											type = dominion					
											is_initiator = yes			
										}
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:HBC							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:HBC						
									}
								}
								AND = {
									exists = c:CAN							
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:CAN						
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
						}
					}
				}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # ет

	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:MAS
					this = c:MAS
				}
				any_diplomatic_play = {
					initiator = root										
					exists = c:MAS										
					target = c:MAS										
					OR = {
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution									
						is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession									
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_ET # а

### BUILDINGS | СООРУЖЕНИЯ ###
## GENITIVE | РОДИТЕЛЬНЫЙ ##
RU_BL_RP = {
	type = building
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_food_industry
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_food_industry
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_textile_mills
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_textile_mills
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_furniture_manufacturies
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_furniture_manufacturies
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_glassworks
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_glassworks
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_tooling_workshops
		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_RP_tooling_workshops
	}

## ACCUSATIVE | ВИНИТЕЛЬНЫЙ ##
RU_BL_VP = {
	type = building

		}

		trigger = {
			is_building_type = building_subsistence_fishing_villages

		localization_key = RU_BL_TP_building_subsistence_rice_paddies

		}
		localization_key = RU_BL_TP_construction_sector

	text = {
		localization_key = RU_BL_TP_DEFAULT

### MARKET | ПРИЛАГАТЕЛЬНЫЕ РЫНКОВ ###
RU_ML_ADJ = {
	type = market
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = market
					market.owner = {
					exists = c:HOL
					this = c:HOL
					c:HOL = {
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = market
					market.owner = {
					exists = c:SCH
					this = c:SCH
					c:SCH = {
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_schleswig_holstein # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:ALD
			this = c:ALD
			c:ALD = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				has_variable = algeria_deylik_restored
			}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_regency_of_algiers # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				OR = {
					has_variable = orleanist_restoration_var
					has_variable = legitimist_restoration_var
				}
				has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
			}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_french_kingdom # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:ALD
			this = c:ALD
			c:ALD = { has_variable = algeria_maghreb_restored }
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_maghreb # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:SAV
			this = c:SAV
			c:SAV = { capital = { state_region = s:STATE_RHONE  } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_lyon # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:SAV
			this = c:SAV
			c:SAV = { capital = { state_region = s:STATE_WEST_SWITZERLAND  } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_romandy # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				has_variable = bonapartist_restoration_var
				has_variable = one_true_french_dynasty
			}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_french_empire # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = {
				OR = {
					has_law = law_type:law_parliamentary_republic
					has_law = law_type:law_presidential_republic
				}
			}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_french_republic # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			c:FRA = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_french_commune # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:PNS
			this = c:PNS
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_united_communes_pns # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:RUS
			this = c:RUS
			coa_def_nihilist_flag_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_union_of_new_people # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:GER
			this = c:GER
			coa_def_nihilist_flag_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_nihilist_germany_name # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:CAL
			this = c:CAL
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_ussr_californias # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:CAL
			this = c:CAL
			c:CAL = {
				owns_entire_state_region = STATE_CALIFORNIA
				owns_entire_state_region = STATE_BAJA_CALIFORNIA
			}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_two_californias # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:KAZ
			this = c:KAZ
			c:KAZ = {
				NOT = {
					has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
				}
			}
			coa_def_independent_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_kazakh_republic # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:KAZ
			this = c:KAZ
			c:KAZ = {
				has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
			}
			coa_def_independent_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_kazakh_khanate # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:KAZ
			this = c:KAZ
			AND = {
				exists = c:RUS
				c:RUS = {
					NOR = {
						has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
						has_law = law_type:law_council_republic
					}
					OR = {
						has_diplomatic_pact = {
							who = c:KAZ
							type = puppet
							is_initiator = yes
						}
						has_diplomatic_pact = {
							who = c:KAZ
							type = dominion
							is_initiator = yes
						}
						has_diplomatic_pact = {
							who = c:KAZ
							type = protectorate
							is_initiator = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_kazakh_alash_autonomy # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:MAD
			this = c:MAD
			c:MAD = {
				coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
				is_country_type = unrecognized
			}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_merina_kingdom # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:WLS
			this = c:WLS
			c:WLS = {
				capital = { state_region = s:STATE_PATAGONIA }
			}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_welsh_patagonia # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
					count > 0
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count < 1
				}
			}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_united_senators # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_def_republic_flag_trigger = yes
			NOT = { coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes }
			NOT = {	
				c:USA = {
					has_law = law_type:law_technocracy
				}
			}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_united_states # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_communist_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_united_syndicates_of_america # market adjective
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_def_republic_flag_trigger = yes
			c:USA = {
				has_law = law_type:law_technocracy
			}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_north_american_technate # market adjective

			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_ML_ADJ_dyn_c_united_synods_of_america # market adjective

		trigger = {
			exists = market
			market.owner = {
			exists = c:TUR
